title: Statius Thebaid 9 - we learn in lines 1-2

content.question: In lines 1-2 (At puer . . . aetas), we learn that the soldier

choices.label: has been killed in a devious way by his companions
is the same age as his comrades
is removed from the battlefield by his friends
thinks that it is simple to escape from the battle

content.answer: is removed from the battlefield by his friends
